name: 艾拉·艾伦

last_movies.title: 喧闹一家亲：圣诞节大冒险！

introduction: Ella Allan was born on November 14, 2010 in California, USA with her twin sister Mia. Ella and Mia Allan, the identical twin sisters who play 'Amy Fogerty' and 'Emma Fogerty' on ABC's hit comedy series "Single Parents," are two of the most sought after young actors working in Hollywood today. Their talents have landed them an unprecedented number of roles across many genres of television and opposite some of the biggest names in the business. Ella and Mia have appeared in recurring roles in shows such as CW's 'Jane the Virgin,' CBS's 'Young Sheldon,' NBC's 'Parenthood' and FX's 'Sons of Anarchy.' They also appeared as a young 'Norma Jean Baker' in the Lifetime television movie 'The Secret Life of Marilyn Monroe.' Outside of acting, Ella & Mia are passionate about making music. Together they try their hand at writing songs. Separately, Ella is drawn to instruments; she has been learning how to play the guitar and the piano. Mia loves to sing so much that her parents nicknamed her 'Songbird.' Aside from entertainment, the twins are very passionate about giving back. As a family, they help with co-star Brad Garrett's Maximum Hope Foundation, an organization that supports the families of terminally ill children with their outstanding bills and funds. Ella & Mia are also passionate about helping animals and aspire to get involved with animal charity organizations. Ella and Mia reside in Los Angeles with their parents and little brother Justin, who is also an actor.
